data: From a private hospital for the insane near Providence, Rhode Island, there recently disappeared an exceedingly singular person.
The case of Charles Dexter Ward
Lovecraft, H. P. (Howard Phillips), 1890-1937; Ferman, Harry, 1906-1973 [Illustrator]
